title: "F|T: The FinTech Times – Crypto startup loses $38.9-million wallet password, goes bankrupt"
excerpt: "Prime Trust pitches itself as a crypto fintech company designed to help other startups offer crypto retirement plans, know-your-customer interfaces, ensure liquidity, and a host of other services. Now, it has found itself bankrupt, primarily because it can’t gain access to a physical crypto wallet with $38.9 million in it."
